trans-unit.source: Provides properties and methods that define a template element in a Web server control at design time.

The TemplateDefinition class provides a base template definition class that can be inherited from and extended for a control designer to use in providing support for templated controls in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
A design host uses the properties and methods of the TemplateDefinition class to facilitate creating and editing a template at design time.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition"></xref> class, using the provided designer, template name, template, and property name.
The parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner"></xref> object.
The name of the template.
The object that contains the template.
The property name that represents this template in the **Properties** list in the design host.
designer is , -or- templatedObject is .

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition"></xref> class, using the provided designer, template name, template, property name, and whether to limit the template contents to Web server controls.
The parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner"></xref> object.
The name of the template.
The object that contains the template.
The property name that represents this template in the **Properties** list in the design host.
A Boolean value indicating whether the template content should allow only Web server controls.
designer is , -or- templatedObject is .

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition"></xref> class, using the provided designer, template name, template, property name, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object.
The parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner"></xref> object.
The name of the template.
The object that contains the template.
The property name that represents this template in the **Properties** list in the design host.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object to apply to each template.
designer is , -or- templatedObject is .

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition"></xref> class, using the provided designer, template name, template, property name, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object, and whether to limit content to Web server controls.
The parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner"></xref> object.
The name of the template.
The object that contains the template.
The property name that represents this template in the **Properties** list in the design host.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object to apply to each template.
A Boolean value indicating whether the template should limit content to Web server controls.
designer is , -or- templatedObject is .
Gets a value that indicates whether the template should enable editing of its contents.
To change the default, derived classes must override the AllowEditing property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if editing is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the HTML markup representing the content of the template.
HTML markup for the content of the template.
Retrieves a value indicating whether the template should limit content to Web server controls, as set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
This property is read-only.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if content is limited to Web server controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Retrieves the style that should be applied to the template as set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
This property is read-only.
Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> property is read-only, the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> can be set.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object.
Retrieves or sets a value indicating whether the template supports data binding.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the template supports data binding; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Retrieves the component in which the template resides.
This property is read-only.
Although this TemplatedObject property is read-only, its properties can be set, and if <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition.AllowEditing%2A> is true, the content can be edited.
The component as set when this <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition"></xref> was created.
Retrieves the property name for the template that the design host should display in the property grid.
The name of the template as it should appear in the **Properties** list of the design host.
